sn_aia_tool.description: Get the results of an qna job. The response is async and may not be finished yet. The response will either be in "IN_PROGRESS", "ERROR", or "COMPLETED". If the process is not finished you may need to wait a few moments and call the API again.
sn_aia_tool.input_schema: [{"name":"task_id","description":"The task_id of the process running QnA"},{"name":"random_id","description":"Random identifier to be able to call this tool again"}]
sn_aia_tool.name: Get attachment summarisation results
